name: sql_agent
description: SQL agent for querying sales data, revenue metrics, and business analytics from the Fabric Lakehouse

query.description: User's natural language query about sales data or business metrics and all the context the agent needs to answer it. Do not write SQL or any other code, just provide a detailed description of what the user is looking for. Include any relevant details such as account names, timeframes, metrics, or specific data points mentioned by the user.

accounts_mentioned.description: List of account names/aliases mentioned in the query, or null if none.
